bibl.title: Cablegram from Henry Rose Carter to the International Health Board, [19--]

div1.p: Carter informs the Board that yellow fever has broken out in Peru and the Peruvian government is seeking help. Carter offers to stay, but will be unable to do field work.

div1.head: Cablegram from Henry Rose Carter to the International Health Board, [19--]
div1.opener:
Paralos Archivas
Cablegram.
Interconational Health Board. (Cable address: INTERCOM NEW YORK)
Intercom:
New york,
div1.p:
FEVER IN SEVERAL TOWNS DEPARTMENT LAMBAYEQUE OF SOME MONTHS
DURATION STOP STEGOMYA NUMEROUS EVERYWHERE UNLESS CONTROLLED WILL
SPREAD SOUTH INTO LIBERTAD AND BEYOND STOP CONTROLLABLE NOW WORK
UNDER WAY STOP PRESIDENT WOULD WELCOME ASSISTANCE AND WOULD LIKE TO
KNOW DETAILS/STOP I HAD NOT PURPOSED REMAINING BUT WILL IF
ESSENTIAL TO SECURE YOUR AID STOP AM UNFIT FOR FURTHER FIELD
DIRECT
SERVICE STOP HANSON ENTIRELY COMPETENT WILL BE IN ABSOLUTE CHARGE
OF EPIDEMIC AND WILL REMAIN IN FIELD STOP CABLE IF I SHOULD STAY
OTHERWISE SAIL MARCH EIGHT CAN REMAIN LONGER WITH LITTLE
INCONVENIENCE IF DESIRED.
